item.title: Prerequisite ðŸ’¡ Create a Codepost Account
item.description: Open codepost enter the invitation code & student email yourName@student.unri.ac.id. Check your e-mail. Usually the email appears in the promotion tab. Click verify email. Set your password. And you can login now. Please login. And has been completed, every time there is a new task, this page will be updated automatically.
